  "title": "Business Development Manager",
  "description": "Vis-Ideal Concept Limited -&nbsp;We are a trusted advisor for brands in Nigeria, providing expert guidance to create and maintain clean and enjoyable environments for our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Business Development Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikorodu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilties


	Maintain current client relationship and identifying areas for potential clients
	Contacting potential clients to establish a business relationship and meet with them
	Develop new sales areas and improving sales through various methods
	Train junior salespeople to improve sales goals and meet expectations
	Strong understanding of company products or services as well as business position and competition to keep business competitive
	Research the latest in the business industry and creating new opportunities to expand business
	Collaborate with sales and design team to ensure requirements are met, such as sales numbers and profit goals
	Identifying and pursuing new business opportunities in target markets
	Establishing and maintaining relationships with potential clients and partners
	Developing and implementing growth strategies and plans
	Managing and retaining relationships with existing clients
	Increasing client base by securing contracts with new customers
	Negotiating and closing business deals that promote sustained revenue
	Having an in-depth knowledge of business products and value proposition
	Writing business proposals and reports to company stakeholders
	Conducting business presentations and product demonstrations to potential clients
	Collaborating with internal teams to ensure client needs are met
	Tracking and reporting on sales activities and using relevant sales performance metrics.


Education and Experience Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
	3+ years of experience in business development or sales
	Experience in General Cleaning Services, Construction, Real Estate, Janitorial, Horticulture, Engineering, [B2B services] preferred
	Familiarity with Salesforce or similar CRM platforms.


Qualifications and Skills:


	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills
	Strategic thinker with a solution-oriented mindset
	Strong understanding of sales and business development processes
	Ability to build rapport quickly and maintain client relationships
	Proficiency with CRM tools and Microsoft Office Suite
	Self-motivated with a track record of achieving or exceeding sales targets.


Salary
N100,000 - N180,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume in PDF to:&nbsp;careers@visideal.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Business Development Manager Job at Vis-Ideal Concept Limited




        
    

        
        Vis-Ideal Concept Limited - We are a trusted advisor for brands in Nigeria, providing expert guidance to create and maintain clean and enjoyable environments for our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager

Job Location: Ikorodu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilties
     

            
    




	Maintain current client relationship and identifying areas for potential clients
	Contacting potential clients to establish a business relationship and meet with them
	Develop new sales areas and improving sales through various methods
	Train junior salespeople to improve sales goals and meet expectations
	Strong understanding of company products or services as well as business position and competition to keep business competitive
	Research the latest in the business industry and creating new opportunities to expand business
	Collaborate with sales and design team to ensure requirements are met, such as sales numbers and profit goals
	Identifying and pursuing new business opportunities in target markets
	Establishing and maintaining relationships with potential clients and partners
	Developing and implementing growth strategies and plans
	Managing and retaining relationships with existing clients
	Increasing client base by securing contracts with new customers
	Negotiating and closing business deals that promote sustained revenue
	Having an in-depth knowledge of business products and value proposition
	Writing business proposals and reports to company stakeholders
	Conducting business presentations and product demonstrations to potential clients
	Collaborating with internal teams to ensure client needs are met
	Tracking and reporting on sales activities and using relevant sales performance metrics.


Education and Experience Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
	3+ years of experience in business development or sales
	Experience in General Cleaning Services, Construction, Real Estate, Janitorial, Horticulture, Engineering, [B2B services] preferred
	Familiarity with Salesforce or similar CRM platforms.


Qualifications and Skills:


	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills
	Strategic thinker with a solution-oriented mindset
	Strong understanding of sales and business development processes
	Ability to build rapport quickly and maintain client relationships
	Proficiency with CRM tools and Microsoft Office Suite
	Self-motivated with a track record of achieving or exceeding sales targets.


Salary
N100,000 - N180,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume in PDF to: careers@visideal.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Customer Address Verification Agent Job at Polaris Digitech Limited




        
    

        
        Polaris Digitech Limited is a Location Intelligence firm, providing data, software and decision support services to fulfill its client’s strategies and management needs through the development and deployment of Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Address Verification Agent

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT), Anambra, Borno, Gombe, and Ogun
Employment Type: Contract

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for Address Verification Agents within these states - Anambra, Borno, FCT, Gombe, Ogun(Ijebu Ode), Lagos (Ikorodu, Ketu, Magodo, Ojota, Agege, Ogba, Ikotun, Surulere, Iganmu, Ikeja, Bariga, Gbagada).
	The candidate will be verifying addresses for Financial Institutions within their localities.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 0-1 year of experience.
	The ideal candidate must have an smart phone and also have knowledge of Google Maps.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@polarisdigitech.net using the Job Position and the Location as the subject of the mail.
